Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Using AI can give me an Idea for my assessments, the teacher teach me overall context. If I have a question I can ask my teacher to make it clear but it not convenient if have to answer my question all the time.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I think the feedback from the teacher is better than AI

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: the teacher will give a detail feed back and what I have to improve but AI can be wrong sometimes.
